General.Name: Gloria Material Technology
General.Description: Gloria Material Technology Corp. manufactures and sells alloy steel and valve-parts in Taiwan, the United States, China, and internationally. Its products include super and titanium alloys, as well as Ti-alloys; and high cleaning steel, alloy tool steel, high speed steel, stainless steel, quenched-tempered steel, and mold material supply products. The company also provides machined parts, such as actuators, blocks, boss products, load caps, and actuator blanks; compressor spacers, seals for gas turbine, turbine blades, and transmission shafts; and copper rod rollers, dummy bar heads, guide rolls, sendzimir rolls, and rolls for slab continuous cast. In addition, it offers air compressor rotors, bolts, couplings, cryogenic BV shafts, HPBV shafts, locking pins, parts for vacuum equipment, pump shafts, pipe fittings, plugs, turbo charger parts, wheel rings, stems, and taper pins. Further, the company engages in general investment and trading activities; and trading of alloy steel. It serves aerospace, energy, oil and gas, water, biomedicine, shipping, and machinery tools and mold industries. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 10, Gong 2nd Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 736
